snippet: The British singer Ellie Goulding reflects on her new relationship (with Skrillex), her new album and singing with the Obamas.
abstract: Snapshot interview with British singer Ellie Goulding, who reflects on her new relationship, her experience singing with the Obamas, and Halcyon, her first album since the 2010 releases of her debut Lights.
lead_paragraph: The British singer Ellie Goulding reflects on her new relationship (with Skrillex), her new album and singing with the Obamas.

headline.seo: Ellie Goulding on Her New Album, ‘Halcyon,’ and More
headline.main: Ellie Goulding on Her New Album, ‘Halcyon,’ and More
headline.print_headline: The Morbid And the Worldly, Merging Anew
